t: NHL uniform - Wikipedia
s: April 9, 2025 - An NHL uniform consists of a hockey jersey, hockey pants, socks, gloves, and a helmet. Historically, the only standardized piece of the equipment has been the sweater (jersey), which has to be of identical design by the same company for all members of a team. Other elements merely have a number scheme, allowing individual players to select their own brand ...
